postcontent: Arsenal SLR 95 MB appears to be unfired . Some light scuffs , but in new condition . Case , new 20 round after market mag .This is an Arsenal SLR 95 . title: For Sale:  Caspian 1911 Commander .45 $900.00
postcontent: Very nice custom 1911 Caspian frame and slide in .45 ACP. Blue, with brushed flats. Locks up super tight and all operation is perfect, and looks to have only been lightly shot. Wilson Combat Match barrel and bushing. Extended EGW ambi safety and extended slide release. Lots of options: blended magwell, ball cut slide, w/ no forward cocking serrations, combat sights, long+curved combat weight trigger, super crisp break, zero overtravel, and a fantastic reset. Hogue wood and rubber grips with finger grooves, with checkering on the front strap under the grip, if you want to change the grips, but the grips provide a lot of cushioning. Some light surface wear from holster carry, and a small light idiot scratch on the bluing, but nothing really that bad. Extremely accurate, hard hitting CC gun, and with a lot of style. This one is a great custom shooter.  More photos on request.

title: For Sale:  Franchi I-12 Inertia Max4 HD w/Twin Shock Absorbers by Benelli
location: Spartanburg, Greenville, Woodruff, Greenville, South Carolina
postcontent:
Franchi I-12 Inertia Max-4 HD w/Twin Shock Absorbers by Benelli 

- Fiber Optic Dual Line Sight System Optimized for fast-handling balance/instinctive pointing
- Ultrareliable Inertia Driven semiautomatic bolt system
- Comes with three choke tubes and a choke-tube wrench
- 4+1 capacity for 2-3/4" and 3" shells
- Weighs only 6.5lbs!!

The Franchi I-12 represents a new line of Franchi auto-loaders by incorporating a free-floating bolt with the Inertia Driven System. The I-12 is well-balanced, and features a narrow-profile fore-end and buttstock. This Franchi shotgun will handle anything from 1-1/8-ounce target loads to the heaviest 3" magnums. Every I-12 Franchi shotgun is powered by the Inertia Driven System. That means no bulky gas cylinders, valves, pistons, or hardware. Without that extra baggage, the I-12 has a slender, low-profile fore-end that fits the shooter's hand for comfortable handling. The I-12's specially-designed recoil pad incorporates a two-part system called the Twin Shock Absorber. During firing, the TSA recoil pad initially holds its shape, and then deeply compresses with the recoil, soaking up the kick and spreading recoil energy over a wider area of the shooter's shoulder, reducing felt recoil by up to 44%. The I-12 in Max-4 HD is an ideal choice as a waterfowl gun. This variant also features a 28-inch ventilated rib barrel, and a red-bar front sight and includes a set of screw-in choke tubes.

Comes with all the chokes plus a Carlson's Black Cloud Duck Choke and even a very TIGHT EXTRA FULL turkey choke that sticks out the barrel 2 inches. These 2 chokes alone are worth at least $100.

Also includes a full set of custom Buttstock shims to allow adjustment in length, as well as side-to-side and Up/Down.

As well as an additional Buttsock Cheekpad from Benelli.

MSRP: $849

Total investment is over $1000
